text: These are the list of personnel changes in the NBA from the 1974–75 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 7, 1974 to June 16, 1975), see the links below ==References== *NBA Transactions at NBA.com *1974-75 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions Category:NBA transactions
title: List of 1974–75 NBA season transactions
